biotools.summary:
Pheromone-Directed Seeker for metabolic pathways.

PhDSeeker is a bio-inspired algorithm for synthesizing linear and branched metabolic pathways.

Pheromone Directed Seeker (PhDSeeker) is a tool based on a bio-inspired algorithm for the automatic synthesis of linear and branched feasible metabolic pathways [1]. It allows relating several compounds simultaneously, ensuring the availability of the substrates for every reaction in the solution.
